3622.verse: فَأَعْرَضُواْ|But they turned away,|170|191|14244$فَأَرْسَلْنَا|so We sent|95|138|6745$عَلَيْهِمْ|upon them|90|132|22$سَيْلَ|(the) flood|91|134|14245$ٱلْعَرِمِ|(of) the dam,|109|130|14246$وَبَدَّلْنَـٰهُم|and We changed for them|192|199|14247$بِجَنَّتَيْهِمْ|their two gardens|137|151|14248$جَنَّتَيْنِ|(with) two gardens|147|161|10753$ذَوَاتَىْ أُكُلٍ|producing fruit|124|138|14249$خَمْطٍ|bitter,|69|76|14250$وَأَثْلٍ|and tamarisks|111|141|14251$وَشَىْءٍ|and (some)thing|128|188|14252$مِّن|of|50|110|53$سِدْرٍ|lote trees|84|144|14253$قَلِيلٍ|few.|60|90|14254$

3624.verse: وَجَعَلْنَا|And We made|111|123|4805$بَيْنَهُمْ|between them|115|139|1056$وَبَيْنَ|and between|106|130|4873$ٱلْقُرَى|the towns|87|111|5829$ٱلَّتِى|which|61|85|232$بَـٰرَكْنَا|We had blessed|124|136|6771$فِيهَا|in it|54|60|253$قُرًى|towns|65|78|14257$ظَـٰهِرَةً|visible.|84|96|13833$وَقَدَّرْنَا|And We determined|149|162|14258$فِيهَا|between them|115|128|253$ٱلسَّيْرَۖ|the journey.|101|114|14259$سِيرُواْ|`Travel|82|88|5449$فِيهَا|between them|115|162|253$لَيَالِىَ|(by) night|86|180|14260$وَأَيَّامًا|and (by) day|106|200|14261$ءَامِنِينَ|safely.`|86|133|9272$

3625.verse: فَقَالُواْ|But they said,|113|133|4596$رَبَّنَا|`Our Lord|84|124|1167$بَـٰعِدْ|lengthen (the distance)|177|217|14262$بَيْنَ|between|77|117|671$أَسْفَارِنَا|our journeys.`|115|135|14263$وَظَلَمُوٓاْ|And they wronged|141|151|4662$أَنفُسَهُمْ|themselves,|99|118|87$فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ|so We made them|139|158|12288$أَحَادِيثَ|narrations|93|112|12296$وَمَزَّقْنَـٰهُمْ|and We dispersed them|175|185|14264$كُلَّ|(in) a total|92|102|2487$مُمَزَّقٍۚ|dispersion.|90|109|14198$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|89|58$فِى|in|48|67|89$ذَٲلِكَ|that|64|83|28$لَأَيَـٰتٍ|surely (are) Signs|137|156|1434$لِّكُلِّ|for everyone,|109|119|3746$صَبَّارٍ|patient|78|318|9523$شَكُورٍ|(and) grateful.|117|357|9524$

3626.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly,|112|119|640$صَدَّقَ|found true|89|104|14265$عَلَيْهِمْ|about them|96|111|22$إِبْلِيسُ|Iblis|76|91|14266$ظَنَّهُۥ|his assumption,|122|137|14267$فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ|so they followed him|156|163|14268$إِلَّا|except|65|128|86$فَرِيقًا|a group|70|197|799$مِّنَ|of|50|177|156$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believers.|110|173|1964$

3621.verse: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land [have you], and a forgiving Lord."

3622.verse: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.

3623.verse: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?

3624.verse: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."

3625.verse: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.

3626.verse: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.

3627.verse: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.

3628.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.
